Looking for your personal mastering engineer?


My name is Keenan, and I created Get Mastered as a way for independent musicians to foster a direct relationship with an experienced audio engineer at a realistic, affordable rate.

When it comes to mastering, a lot of producers like to say, "you get what you pay for." I like to think of Get Mastered as the exception that makes the rule.

Projects with higher track counts qualify for rates even lower than $39 per song. Contact me for more info.

How does Get Mastered provide such low rates?

I founded Get Mastered because there is simply nowhere for musicians to get a professional, quality mastering job for under $100 per song. I've been mixing my own music for years, and I've found it impossible to get mastered at anything close to an affordable rate.

With Get Mastered, you are not paying less for a "cheaper" mastering job; you're paying a price that's actually fair.

Get Mastered recruits extremely talented up and coming engineers that understand what fair pricing means for independent musicians, and are eager to work for fair wages doing what they love: helping you.

Test the waters, and get a free master from your personal mastering engineer by clicking here!

Ready to Get Mastered?


Send me high quality bounces of your mixes using the form below. Make sure to read my post on Preparing Your Mixes For Mastering so that I can get you the best master possible!

Having issues? On mobile? You can also send your files, questions, and concerns directly to services@getmastered.com

What are people saying about me?

Check out some of my past clients and see what they thought of their mastered tracks.

"Keenan was amazing, he worked with me throughout the process and even helped advise me on subtle ways to make my record better. He cared not just about his work process but what I did as well, and that's what makes the best records – people working together. If you want a mastering engineer to help take your recordings to the next level, Keenan's your guy."
Andrew Nappo

"Keenan and did a great job finishing the tracks. He brought some nice stuff out in the mix that I didn't hear before and made sure that everything was very even and still had punch to it. Great work."
Max Gunther

“Keenan did an excellent job mastering my songs. He was responsive to my notes and, as we collaborated, was quick to turn around each new draft. I’d recommend his services to anyone looking to get their project professionally mastered.”
Colin Zelin

"I had a great time working with Keenan from Get Mastered. He approached my music with an open-minded, collaborative attitude, offering constructive advice and expertise while still working to retain the spirit and vision of what I was trying to make. He's a talented engineer with a solid ear - I would recommend him to anyone!"
Matthew O'Connor
